description: [Daggerfly](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1034) has used PowerShell and [BITSAdmin](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0190) to retrieve follow-on payloads from external locations for execution on victim machines.(Citation: Symantec Daggerfly 2023)

external_references.description: Threat Hunter Team. (2023, April 20). Daggerfly: APT Actor Targets Telecoms Company in Africa. Retrieved July 25, 2024.
